Name: Unbreakable
description: The magic item cannot be harmed or damaged through non-magical means.

Name: Drawing blows
description: You can use your reaction to redirect a successful attack made to an adjacent target to you instead

Name: Arcane script
description: Symbols, writing, or a small area of the magic item softly glows, producing dim light for a one foot radius

Name: Arcane sensation
description: When you first touch the magic item, you feel a predetermined sensation chosen by it's crafter

Name: Gleaming
description: The magic item is always clean. dirt, grime, or any sullying material sheds off of the object

Name: Moon touched
description: The magic item sheds dim light in a ten foot radius when in darkness

Name: Cantrip immunity
description: The character attuned to this item is granted immunity from all effects and damage for a predetermined spell of level one or lower, while wearing or touching the item

Name: Cantrip casting
description: The magic item's weilder can use the object to cast a predetermined cantrip

Name: Easily lost
description: The magic item and any of it's contents are invisible when worn

Name: Lost but not forgotten
description: The magic item and any of it's contents are invisible when worn. The character attuned to the item can sense it's direction and exact distance from themselves

Name: Spell level once a day
description: Adds one spell level to the "once a day" spell level pool

Name: Arcane focus
description: The magic item is an arcane focus for a predetermined class

Name: Universal focus
description: The magic item is an arcane focus for the character attuned to it

Name: Caster's choice
description: Any spells the magic item is capable of being used to cast also become known spells to the character attuned to this item, so long as they are a spell caster and so long as they are attuned to it.

Name: Glimmering
description: The magic items appears to be a really valuable object

Name: Shoddy
description: The magic item appears to be a mundane or worthless object

Name: On off switch
description: The character attuned to this item can use a bonus action to activate or deactivate persistant properties of the magic item

Name: A little luck
description: The character attuned to this item is granted advantage to a predetermined skill or ability check when opposing a predetermined race or creature type, while wearing or touching the item

Name: Two spell levels once a day
description: Adds two spell level to the "once a day" spell level pool

Name: One spell level thrice a day
description: Adds one spell level to the "three times a day" spell level pool

Name: Cantrips ahoy
description: The magic item's weilder can use the object to cast one of three predetermined cantrips

Name: Plus one attack
description: This magic item grants the weilder +1 to their attacks and damage rolls when using this item as the weapon

Name: Plus one armor
description: This magic item grants the weilder +1 to their AC when worn

Name: Plus one spell casting
description: This magic item grants the weilder +1 to the spell attach and damage rolls when using this item as an arcane focus

Name: Flight
description: The magic item can fly with a fly speed of 30'

Name: Healing boost
description: The magic item adds 1d6 healing to healing spells cast when the character attuned to the item uses the item as an arcane focus

Name: Adamantine weave
description: Critical hits against the wearer of this item count as normal hits

Name: Auto stabilization
description: The wearer is stabilized if their health drops to or below zero

Name: Productive crafting
description: When the character attuned to this item uses a workweek of downtime to craft, an additional workweek's of production may be added

Name: Bigger on the inside
description: The magic item now contains a 64 cubic foot extra dimensional space

Name: Lucky item
description: The character attuned to this item gains advantage on a predetermined skill or ability check

Name: Disease immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to disease while touching it or it is worn

Name: Blind immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to the blinded condition while touching it or it is worn

Name: Charm immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to the charmed condition while touching it or it is worn

Name: Deafened immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to the deafened condition while touching it or it is worn

Name: Frightened immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to the firghtened condition while touching it or it is worn

Name: Paralyzed immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to the paralyzed condition while touching it or it is worn

Name: Petrified immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to the petrified condition while touching it or it is worn

Name: Poisoned immunity
description: the character attuned to this item gains immunity to the poisoned condition while touching it or it is worn

Name: Weakening attacks
description: When damaged by this magic item, the victim cannot regain health until the start of this item's weilder's next turn

Name: Dark vision
description: This item grants an additional 60' of darkvision when used

Name: Telescopic vision
description: This item allows the user to use a bonus action to see a chosen target up to 60' away as if they are right in front of it.

Name: Greater smell
description: This item grants advantage on perception checks that rely on a sense of smell

Name: Greater hearing
description: This item grants advantage on perception checks that rely on a sense of hearing

description: The character attuned to this item gains resistance to Slashing damage while touching this item or it is worn

Name: Seven spell levels once a day

Name: Plus three attack
description: This magic item grants the weilder +3 to their attacks and damage rolls when using this item as the weapon

description: This magic item grants the weilder +3 to their AC when worn

Name: Sentient
description: This magic item has a sentience and can communicate with the character that is attuned to it via a telepathic bond. It has an Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma of 12 and is proficient in Wisdom saving throws. The item also has blindsight for a 10' radius. This item can take "Use magic item" action to use it's own properties on the attuned character's turn.

Name: Animated
description: This magic item gains a speed of 30 and can take appropriate physical actions based on it's form. If the item is not sentient, then the character attuned to it may use their bonus action to direct it

Name: Boosted Intelligence
description: The character attuned to this item gains +2 to their Intelligence and their maximum is increased by 2.

Name: Boosted Strength
description: The character attuned to this item gains +2 to their Strength and their maximum is increased by 2.
